plot: We are on the edge of Finisterrae, regarded in ancient times as the 'Last Stop'. Amin Lazar, a polish pilgrim, is trying to understand where the way ends and what he has to do: stop and go back home or keep walking, maybe forever...
title: La Concha de la Vieira
plot_es: We are on the edge of Finisterrae, regarded in ancient times as the 'Last Stop'. Amin Lazar, a polish pilgrim, is trying to understand where the way ends and what he has to do: stop and go back home or keep walking, maybe forever...
plot_en: We are on the edge of Finisterrae, regarded in ancient times as the 'Last Stop'. Amin Lazar, a polish pilgrim, is trying to understand where the way ends and what he has to do: stop and go back home or keep walking, maybe forever...
